by reflecting, praying.'' letter to supporters Thursday, Mike Pence said he and his family`` feel led to devote this time in our lives to continuing to serve the people of Indiana in some way.'' In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana. We will not seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012, he said. Mike Pence is slated to speak at several county Republican dinners throughout the state and says he expects to also talk with people outside the political sphere as he makes his decision.
